Get HLA gene names from IMGTHLA

hla_genes.Rd

Retrieve the contents of github.com/ANHIG/IMGTHLA/alignments and return a list of gene names derived from the txt files in that folder.

Usage

hla_genes(release = "latest", type = FALSE, overwrite = FALSE, verbose = FALSE)

Arguments

release

Default is "latest". Should be a release name like "3.51.0".

type

Return "{gene}_{type}" (e.g. "DRB1_prot") instead of "{gene}" (e.g. "DRB1").

overwrite

Overwrite the existing genes.json file with a new one from GitHub

verbose

If TRUE, print messages along the way.

Value

A character vector of HLA gene names like "DRB1"

See also

hla_releases() to get a complete list of all release names.

Examples

# \donttest{
hla_genes() 
#>  [1] "A"      "B"      "C"      "ClassI" "DMA"    "DMB"    "DOA"    "DOB"   
#>  [9] "DPA1"   "DPA2"   "DPB1"   "DPB2"   "DQA1"   "DQA2"   "DQB1"   "DQB2"  
#> [17] "DRA"    "DRB1"   "DRB3"   "DRB4"   "DRB5"   "DRB"    "E"      "F"     
#> [25] "G"      "HFE"    "H"      "J"      "K"      "L"      "MICA"   "MICB"  
#> [33] "N"      "P"      "S"      "TAP1"   "TAP2"   "T"      "U"      "V"     
#> [41] "W"      "Y"     
hla_genes(type = TRUE) 
#>   [1] "A_gen"       "A_nuc"       "A_prot"      "B_gen"       "B_nuc"      
#>   [6] "B_prot"      "C_gen"       "C_nuc"       "C_prot"      "ClassI_nuc" 
#>  [11] "ClassI_prot" "DMA_gen"     "DMA_nuc"     "DMA_prot"    "DMB_gen"    
#>  [16] "DMB_nuc"     "DMB_prot"    "DOA_gen"     "DOA_nuc"     "DOA_prot"   
#>  [21] "DOB_gen"     "DOB_nuc"     "DOB_prot"    "DPA1_gen"    "DPA1_nuc"   
#>  [26] "DPA1_prot"   "DPA2_gen"    "DPA2_nuc"    "DPB1_gen"    "DPB1_nuc"   
#>  [31] "DPB1_prot"   "DPB2_gen"    "DPB2_nuc"    "DQA1_gen"    "DQA1_nuc"   
#>  [36] "DQA1_prot"   "DQA2_gen"    "DQA2_nuc"    "DQA2_prot"   "DQB1_gen"   
#>  [41] "DQB1_nuc"    "DQB1_prot"   "DQB2_gen"    "DQB2_nuc"    "DQB2_prot"  
#>  [46] "DRA_gen"     "DRA_nuc"     "DRA_prot"    "DRB1_gen"    "DRB1_nuc"   
#>  [51] "DRB1_prot"   "DRB3_gen"    "DRB3_nuc"    "DRB3_prot"   "DRB4_gen"   
#>  [56] "DRB4_nuc"    "DRB4_prot"   "DRB5_gen"    "DRB5_nuc"    "DRB5_prot"  
#>  [61] "DRB_nuc"     "DRB_prot"    "E_gen"       "E_nuc"       "E_prot"     
#>  [66] "F_gen"       "F_nuc"       "F_prot"      "G_gen"       "G_nuc"      
#>  [71] "G_prot"      "HFE_gen"     "HFE_nuc"     "HFE_prot"    "H_gen"      
#>  [76] "H_nuc"       "J_gen"       "J_nuc"       "K_gen"       "K_nuc"      
#>  [81] "L_gen"       "L_nuc"       "MICA_gen"    "MICA_nuc"    "MICA_prot"  
#>  [86] "MICB_gen"    "MICB_nuc"    "MICB_prot"   "N_gen"       "N_nuc"      
#>  [91] "P_gen"       "S_gen"       "S_nuc"       "TAP1_gen"    "TAP1_nuc"   
#>  [96] "TAP1_prot"   "TAP2_gen"    "TAP2_nuc"    "TAP2_prot"   "T_gen"      
#> [101] "T_nuc"       "U_gen"       "U_nuc"       "V_gen"       "V_nuc"      
#> [106] "W_gen"       "W_nuc"       "Y_gen"       "Y_nuc"      
# }
